name: Achiever
title: Achiever
author: Gangsir
contact: The best way to reach me is to PM me on Reddit, at /u/Gangsir. If you need to submit an issue with the mod, please do so on the bitbucket repository.
description: Adds many more achievements for players that feel there aren't enough. Includes global, per force, and per player achievements that are a bit more interesting.
